languages.text: "Ты с каким-то особым чувством упоминал своего прапрадеда. Почему он так важен?"
"You speak of your great-great-grandfather with particular enthusiasm. What makes him so important?"
languages.original_text: "Ты с каким-то особым чувством упоминал своего прапрадеда. Почему он так важен?"

traits.locale_text: "You spoke with a lot of feeling of your great-great-grandfather. What makes him so important?"
"You spoke with a lot of feeling of your great-great-grandfather. What makes him so important?"
"You speak of your great-great-grandfather with particular enthusiasm. What makes him so important?"
"You speak of your great-great-grandfather with particular enthusiasm. What makes him so important?"
"You speak of your great-great-grandfather with particular enthusiasm. What makes him so important?"
"You speak of your great-great-grandfather with particular enthusiasm. What makes him so important?"

languages.text: « Vous parlez de votre arrière-arrière-grand-père avec un enthousiasme inhabituel. Était-ce un personnage important ? »
languages.original_text: "You speak of your great-great-grandfather with particular enthusiasm. What makes him so important?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous parlez de votre arrière-arrière-grand-père avec un enthousiasme inhabituel. Était-ce un personnage important ? »

languages.text: «Habla de su tatarabuelo con mucho entusiasmo. ¿Por qué es tan importante?».
languages.original_text: "You speak of your great-great-grandfather with particular enthusiasm. What makes him so important?"

traits.locale_text: «Habla de su tatarabuelo con mucho entusiasmo. ¿Por qué es tan importante?».

languages.text: “刚刚谈到你的曾曾祖父的时候，你的语气变得非常激动。对你而言，他为什么这么重要？”
languages.original_text: "You speak of your great-great-grandfather with particular enthusiasm. What makes him so important?"

traits.locale_text: “刚刚谈到你的曾曾祖父的时候，你的语气变得非常激动。对你而言，他为什么这么重要？”

languages.text: 「お前は曾祖父を大切に思っているようだ。なぜそこまで尊敬する？」
languages.original_text: "You speak of your great-great-grandfather with particular enthusiasm. What makes him so important?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は曾祖父を大切に思っているようだ。なぜそこまで尊敬する？」

languages.text: "Ihr sprecht mit großer Begeisterung von Eurem Ur-Urgroßvater. Was macht ihn so wichtig?"
languages.original_text: "You speak of your great-great-grandfather with particular enthusiasm. What makes him so important?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sprecht mit großer Begeisterung von Eurem Ur-Urgroßvater. Was macht ihn so wichtig?"

languages.text: "Büyük büyük büyükbabandan özel bir coşkuyla söz ediyorsun. Onu bu kadar önemli yapan şey ne?"
languages.original_text: "You speak of your great-great-grandfather with particular enthusiasm. What makes him so important?"
